Landrace Gardening

plant breeding gardening
Author: Joseph Lofthouse
Published by: Going to Seed

Discover the art and science of growing locally adapted, nutrient-dense food. Learn how to use seed-saving, high diversity, and time-honored selection techniques.
This self-paced course blends video with text, drawing inspiration from Joseph's book, "Landrace Gardening". It also features insights from seasoned landrace gardeners and offers a wealth of supplementary resources.
